attributes.action: An inquiry into the organisation known as Common Purpose
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call upon HM Government to carry out a public independent investigation into the organisation known as Common Purpose.

Specifically, we want the subsequent report to include (but not be limited to) the following:

1) Statement of monies received by Common Purpose from the public purse since inception

2) Members of Parliament who have attended training courses or otherwise have interests in Common Purpose

3) Members of other public bodies including non-governmental and local councils who have attended training courses or otherwise have interests in Common Purpose

4) An assessment of whether Common Purpose warrants charitable status under the Charities Act 2011, including an assessment whether the organisation exists for the public benefit
